jobs.name: Cleaner Instructor
jobs.description: As a cleaner instructor at Faith you will be responsible for teaching new-hire cleaners everything they need to know about how to properly clean a home. Everything from the basics of cleaning, to customer service, and advanced time-saving techniques.

jobs.name: Product Manager
jobs.description: Our flagship mobile application needs a stellar product manager to facilitate a continuous feedback loop between our sponsors, clients, and in-house development team. You will be responsible for setting priority on features and maintaining a release schedule.
skills: Has held a remote job in the past
